text:
Run by the [[eneko]] ''Elibadhma Galmemean'', this smithy and pawnshop (named after the ancient [[brass dragon]] [[Qataakhast]]) is the best place in [[Ardhmen]] to buy or sell armor, weapons, and accessories. One can even find treasures of the nomadic [[stone giant]]s of the [[Andnemun Desert]] here.

Though gruff, Elibadhma loves a good story, and has been known to provide discounts to folks who regale him with tales of adventure.
title: Brass Dragon
